question: Which body recommends the selection of heads of public sector banks and financial institutions?
explanation:
Banks Board Bureau, which started operating from 1 April 2016, recommends selection of heads of public sector banks and financial institutions.
Recently, a set of 14 general managers and chief general managers have been appointed as executive directors (ED) in 10 public sector banks. The Banks Board Bureau (BBB) had recommended names of 13 candidates, in September last year.
